title: The 15 most accurate interpretations of seeing a dream about being immersed in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: The dream of the flood in Ibn Sirin’s dream: The flood is one of the important visions that needs a comprehensive explanation, to divide the connotations related to the good that the forerunner can attain or the evil that befalls him due to the great danger that surrounds him, and this is what we mention. . For you through the article below. Interpretation of seeing a sea flood in a dream? A flood in a dream is evidence of different details of its vision, and flood and inundation are synonymous with the same meaning, which is an overflow of water, an excess of need, and an excess of the required level. Which causes widespread destruction and devastation. Heavy rain falls from the sky, reaching a torrential point. Seeing him in a dream can be a sign of comfort, relief, and loss of distress, only when the dreamer is going through some difficulties or crises. Seeing a flood and a flood may indicate that the dreamer is being persecuted by enemies and is subjected to severe injustice, but if the dreamer is able to avoid the flood and keep it away, this indicates his ability To repel the enemy's conspiracy. It removes from him injustice and the death of worry and distress. What is the interpretation of a dream about a flood and a flood? Seeing a dream about a flood and a flood in a man’s dream is one of the unwanted signs and symbols that warn a person of many things, for example: The arrival of a flood in the direction of the man in his dream means that he will survive a great disaster. It almost caused it to fall. Seeing a flood in red in a dream is one of the symbols that indicate the spread of epidemics and an imminent danger that affects the city and country in which a person resides, sweeping it and causing devastation, destruction, and great harm to all individuals and people in that city. As for the torrential torrents that are sweeping the country in... A man’s dream is evidence of committing immorality and sin, and being exposed to severe wrath from the Lord (Glory be to Him). When a person dreams of a flood but without its time, this means that there are specific dates for the floods that are known according to meteorological principles and weather conditions. What is the interpretation of a dream about a flood and its survival? Seeing a flood in a dream, as we mentioned, is a warning to the one who has the vision lest he fall into a crisis, distress, or great anxiety that will befall him. What is the interpretation of a dream about a flood by Ibn Sirin? Ibn Sirin mentioned the interpretation of a flood in a dream as one of the warning signs of disasters and calamities that will befall that city if it is ravaged. Floods and destroyed it. He also said that it shows that war is raging in this city, and that it is under the oppression of an unjust and tyrannical ruler, which will lead to a future period of great trouble and suffering. What is the interpretation of a dream about escaping from a flood? For a person to see in his dream as if escaping from the flood is a sign On the resistance within him and the ability to overcome all challenges and difficulties, regardless of what he faced and his pain. Removing the torrent or flood from the dreamer’s house in his dream is evidence that he deals with enemies with all severity and strength to protect his family from oppression and repression. As for a person’s ability to swim in the waters of the flood in His sleep is evidence of freedom from torment and severe repentance. The Egyptian site is the largest dream interpretation site in the Arab world. All you have to do is type the Egyptian dream interpretation site in Google and get the answer.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a disabled person walking in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing a disabled person who can walk in a dream generally indicates the end of vision problems. As for the rest of the visions, such as a dream of a disabled person who can walk, or a disabled person who walks, or a paralyzed person who walks, if a disabled woman walks, or a disabled person is healed, or she gets married. Disabled person and everything else. We will explain it to you by completing the topic of the scholar Ibn Sirin for the unmarried girl, the married woman, the pregnant woman, the divorced woman, and the man as well: Interpretation of a person with special needs in a dream. Seeing a disabled person in a dream means that there are family problems in the dreamer’s life and that he will achieve great achievements at work, but he will not be accepted, so he will live miserable and face risks. big. His work and his efforts at work will be wasted to no avail. Seeing marriage to a disabled person in a dream means that the dreamer will face major problems in professional and social life and that he will face some risks, and although he will achieve great success in his work, he will fall into bad situations. Seeing a person A disabled person in a dream means that you will encounter scammers in the dreamer’s social life, so the dreamer will fall into great trouble and all his steps will be full of risks. Seeing a disabled person in a dream indicates that there are difficult days ahead of the dreamer, and he will live with great problems and difficulties, whether he wants it or not. He will live with many problems and be more in debt. As the days go by. Seeing a wheelchair in a dream thanks to great success, the visionary will be promoted in his field of work. Interpretation of a disabled person who can walk in a dream. Seeing a disabled person walking in a dream means that problems at work will end, sorrows and worries will end, and that his condition will improve greatly, and he will live a better life. Beautiful and happy. To see someone walking easily, even though he cannot walk in real life, means that you will achieve your goals and ambitions and that you will experience some events that will make you happy. This vision shows at the same time the good events that the owner of the vision will experience, comfort after anxiety, and healing. After illness, receiving material and moral comfort, the walking person will free himself from crises and achieve what he wants. This world. A person is unable to walk in real life and walks comfortably in a dream. The vision is a sign that he has achieved all his dreams and is happy with them. At the same time, it is an indication of one’s experience of beautiful events and one’s sense of comfort after being freed from one’s problems. It also indicates The vision of the dreamer recovering from his illness and improving his mental state and health. Walking with a disabled person in a dream means getting rid of his sorrows and achieving all his desires.

title: Interpretation of a white shirt in a dream: Wearing a white shirt in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a white shirt indicates good religion and high morals, and other interpretations we interpret for a single woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, a married man, or a bachelor, such as: buying a white shirt or seeing a young man wearing a white shirt and taking it off, or wearing a dirty white shirt, washing the white shirt. He sews his pocket, and I dreamed that my shirt was tight, wide, long or short and belonged to Ibn Sirin. And more in continuation of the topic. Interpretation of a white shirt in a dream. The meaning of a white shirt in a dream is religion and worship, and the example of a shirt in visions is like a dress, and both of them refer to the one who wears it, because their cleanliness or goodness indicates the uprightness of the dreamer’s affairs in religion and in this world. A white shirt is a sign of good character and good morals. You saw a white shirt in a dream, this indicates a healthy body and mind or about to recover from illness. A white shirt is a sign of purity of heart, energy, and positive thoughts in the practical environment. And whoever sees himself wearing a white shirt, it is evidence of religion and piety. A white shirt shows benevolence to the monarch and justice in his religion. The color that accompanies The shirt indicates the meaning of the wearer’s personality, and the matter is also measured on the wearer’s forehead. Whoever sees or sees more than one shirt in his dream, this indicates that he will be rewarded to God after that with many good deeds, and he will have a great reward. Interpretation of a woman who wears a shirt in a harsh way, as long as it is loose, it shows her goodness in Her religion, her position in the world, her life with her husband and her happiness, considering the color white or light you have a preference. Regarding a tight white shirt in a dream, therefore it is interpreted contrary to what was mentioned above about the evil of life and her warning about her religion and her distance from it, or her distance from her husband and her separation from her. If the dreamer is a woman and she sees that she is wearing a white shirt This indicates that her circumstances will improve and that her marriage will be successful. The green and white shirt also indicates religion, the red shirt indicates fame, and the yellow shirt indicates fame. Illness. The one who wears a white shirt without a pocket in a dream indicates his death, and if the dreamer wears a shirt made of wood, he will travel to the sea, and if he is sick, he may die. Also, the white shirt is interpreted as a person’s religion and righteousness, and wearing the shirt is up to the one who wears it. If a woman sees that she has put on a new, clean, loose shirt, then this is her good condition in her religious and worldly affairs, as well as the condition of her husband. He said: If I see people presented to me wearing shirts, some of which reached the chest and others below it, then Omar was presented with a shirt that drags. Whoever sees in his dream that he is wearing white clothes, in reality he has a clean and healthy mind, and the white color on the shirt, for example, indicates good health. Good or healing. The white shirt in the vision is praiseworthy because it expresses a generous person, moderate in character, loving kindness, upright in principle and correct in opinion. Buying a white shirt in a dream is a lot of good and legitimate money. As you see, a white shirt in a dream is for a married woman who has a lot of nourishment. Good and good, there is another opinion

title: Interpretation of reading the Qur’an in a dream and its meaning in all cases by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: We talk through an encyclopedia about the interpretation of reciting the Qur’an in a dream, as the virtues of the Qur’an are many for those who read it, and God Almighty has made reciting the Qur’an one of His opinions. The best deeds that a servant approaches, while there must be agreement between a Muslim and the Qur’an, is the energy that a person derives. It contains clarity of mind, strength of memory, and comfort of the heart, while the verses of the Qur’an strengthen and strengthen the reader in dealing with life’s difficulties and pressures, and feeling With joy and happiness as a result. It is part of a Muslim’s heart to cling to his Lord except through strength and trust. When the dreamer wakes up after hearing verses from the Qur’an during his sleep, he continues to search for interpretations and meanings of those verses. Interpretation of reciting the Qur’an in a dream. Many scholars differed in interpreting visions of reciting the Qur’an, and this difference is due to differences in The situation in which the Qur’an was heard in a dream, as well as the dreamer’s situation with the recitation. The vision and the following are the most important of these interpretations: Seeing the dreamer reciting the Holy Qur’an in a dream means that God grants a good partner, stability in marital life and overcoming difficulties in it. Visions with the recitation of the Qur’an show the abundance of goodness and the strength of the relationship between the servant and his Lord. The interpretation of reading the Qur’an in a dream for a single woman has been interpreted by scholars Seeing reading the Holy Qur’an as one of the attributes of the righteous, because it brings goodness to its owner. Below we examine the most prominent interpretations of seeing an unmarried woman reading the Qur’an in a dream: Seeing an unmarried woman reading the Qur’an with her friends in a dream means that the Lord will grant her happiness and livelihood soon. Seeing an unmarried woman reading the Qur’an with a man she does not know in a dream indicates that the date of her marriage is approaching. A man of good character, and the nobleman will give her happiness by marrying him. Also, seeing an unmarried woman reading the Qur’an in a dream means that she will have a lot of livelihood and she will reap what she has sown of good deeds in her life. This is how the vision is interpreted as his closeness to God Almighty, and his being the best helper in overcoming Obstacles and problems that he goes through. On the other hand, seeing a girl entering the mosque and reading the Qur’an in a dream shows her good morals that are accepted by the Creator. Seeing a girl holding the Qur’an in her hands and reciting its verses in a dream indicates good companionship in this world, and they may help each other in Getting closer to Al-Wahhab and reaching Paradise. Reading the Qur’an in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a married woman reading the Qur’an in her dream has different interpretations, so it is evidence of goodness and good offspring, as well as advice that must be followed to escape troubles in this world. Seeing a married woman reading Reciting the Qur’an to her children in a dream is interpreted as good offspring and the best support in old age, as God has given them many benefits and goodness for them, their parents, and their families. A married woman seeing the Qur’an in a dream indicates that God will compensate her and reward her for what she endured in the days when she, her husband, and her children are happy. If any. A married woman’s vision of her husband reciting the Qur’an to her indicates that he will work on...

title: What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a yellow snake in a dream?

preview.html: The yellow snake in a dream. The snake is considered a dangerous reptile, and seeing it in the dreamer’s dream makes him anxious, but it carries within it many suggestions and interpretations, such as those that express goodness, goodness, strength, and others that bring nothing but sorrow to the owner. And anxiety and bad luck, and we will include all the details related to this topic in the following article. A serious health condition makes him bedridden and prevents him from performing sad and anxious daily activities and tasks. If one sees a yellow snake in a dream, this is clear evidence of the presence of a malicious and deceitful person who pretends to love him and has strong enmity and plans to give him a strong stab in the back that will kill him for him. Always, so he must be careful. If the dreamer is working and sees the yellow snake in his dream, this is a clear indication of many problems and crises that he is exposed to in his workplace because of his colleagues who hate him. The yellow snake in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin explained many of its meanings and associations. Associated with seeing a yellow snake in a dream, the most important of which are the following: If a person sees a yellow snake in his dream, this is clear evidence that he is going through a difficult period of financial distress, distress, lack of financial resources, and accumulation of debts, which leads to controlling the psychological pressures on him. If a man gets married and sees a yellow snake in his bed in a dream, this is clear evidence that his partner is corrupt in his personality and is committing major sins, and that there is another man in her life. Interpretation of a dream about a yellow snake in a married man’s bed symbolizes that one of his children will be exposed to an insurmountable disaster. What is the interpretation of seeing a yellow snake in a dream for a single woman? Seeing a yellow snake in a dream for a single woman has many interpretations and symbols, the most important of which are the following: If an unmarried woman gets engaged and sees a yellow snake in her dream, she will separate from her partner due to incompatibility and many problems. Between them. If a girl sees the yellow snake in her dream, this is a sign of her bad luck on the emotional level, which makes her miserable and unhappy. From the point of view of the great Nabulsi scholar, if an unmarried woman sees the yellow snake in her dream, this is clear evidence of the corruption of her life and her distance from God and her many sins. She must hasten to repent and return to God so that her end will not be bad. Interpretation of a dream about a yellow snake in a vision for a girl who is still studying means her inability to pass exams and failure, which makes her feel disappointed and hopeless. title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a tall man in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a tall man in a dream in detail, as there are tall men and this does not diminish their importance, as well as some who are characterized by short stature, and each of them has its own characteristics and disadvantages, but what is the interpretation of seeing a tall man in a dream? It certainly indicates many indicators, so we will deal clearly and in detail with what It is the interpretation of the dream of a tall man in a dream for both single, married and pregnant women, as the best and correct interpretation of this long dream is determined according to the leading Arab translators and scholars.Interpretation of the dream of a tall man by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Ibn Sirin explained the vision of a tall man in a dream, as it is a praiseworthy vision for To me. Seeing a tall man in a dream also indicates a long and long life for the dreamer. Seeing a tall man in a dream also indicates good luck full of joy and happiness for my opinion in his life. Seeing a tall man in a dream means a long journey in reality. Interpretation of a dream of a tall man for a single woman indicates Seeing a tall man with broad shoulders in a dream indicates good and strong luck in her life. Seeing a tall man in a dream for an unmarried girl means that you will achieve what you want in life. Seeing a tall man with a beard in a dream for an unmarried girl means that he is already married to a scholar or the imam of the mosque. Interpretation of a dream about a tall man with a married woman: A married woman’s opinion that her husband has become taller in a dream indicates an increase in providing goodness. Seeing a married woman feeding a tall man in a dream is a sign that good things are coming her way. Seeing a tall man for a married woman In a dream it is a symbol of a womb relationship. Seeing a tall married man in a dream also indicates success in his life. Interpretation of a dream of a tall man for a pregnant womanSeeing a tall man in a pregnant woman’s dream is a sign of good luck and ease of her position. Seeing a tall man by a pregnant woman In a dream, it also indicates the birth of a male child. As for the interpretation of dreaming of seeing a tall man in a pregnant woman’s dream, this indicates the ease of childbirth for her. Seeing a tall dead man in a dream. Seeing a tall dead man or increasing the height of the dead indicates his high status and the increase of his good deeds, with permission. God. As for seeing a person in his dream as if he were dead, chasing him and chasing him, this indicates that the dreamer is on the right path in his life’s path. This interpretation applies to seeing a long-dead man or woman in a dream, and God knows best. With this we conclude today’s topic about the interpretation of seeing a man. A tall dead man in a dream, provided that the interpretation of seeing a short man in a dream is through the topic of the following article, God willing. Other interpretations of a tall man in a dream Seeing a tall man in a dream is an important sign, and height in a dream is one of the promising signs that indicates longevity or gray hair in the Salah Wahba. Seeing a tall man in a dream is an indication of the dreamer’s long life. Or an abundance of food, or good luck, or success and distinction, God willing. And a tall or huge man is a sign of travel or the West, and if that man is unknown to God’s opinion.

title: What is the interpretation of a married man’s dream of driving a car according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about driving a car for a married man: Men love driving and racing cars, especially at high speeds, despite the risks that may surround this topic. A man can see in his dream that he is driving a car according to the different colors or conditions in which he is walking, and in fact there are many indications of this dream that we explain in our article. Interpretation of a dream about driving a car for a married man by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about driving a car for a married man. Most interpreters see that a car In a dream, it represents a woman or a wife. If the man is driving the best car, the dream means in reality that there is a calm relationship that prevails between him and her and that the existing differences are greatly diminished. However, if the attempt at driving fails or is conflicting, the interpretation is also related to the wife, as he sees With it there are many obstacles, which may be the result of his actions, but in general there is tension in this relationship. Driving fast has the meaning of the victory of evil people in a person’s life, and the dreamer has been able to exclude them from his life and his clear victory over them. But if he is logical and drives his car very soberly, then it can Saying that he is a mature person who thinks about everything and calculates it well before doing it and has many plans in his life that he is trying hard to implement. If he is able to overcome obstacles through his car, then in his waking state he will be able to get rid of difficulties and remove difficult obstacles from his path as a result of his wisdom and strength. Interpretation of a dream about driving a car for a married man by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that seeing a man driving a car confirms the many responsibilities he bears. However, he is a special person and acts very rationally, and this allows him to withstand all pressures. It is expected that a married man will have a satisfactory and happy relationship with his wife if he drives the car calmly, but if she is in front of him on the road, there are signs that confirm the bad conditions he is living in with his wife. If The man was driving it and his wife sat next to him in the dream and they walked in a modest way, then he will achieve many goals with her and will be able to implement some joint plans in their lives. When exposed to accidents with this car, interpretation scholars warn the man of many upcoming challenges that he must be accompanied by calmness and wisdom to overcome, This can be explained in another way, which is tension and attraction in the marital relationship, and there is no instability. Ibn Sirin explains that when the dreamer tries to move the car and make it move, but he is stubborn, then the dream confirms his great effort in some matters that will not succeed in the end, but if he moves and goes with it, he will reach His car. But with difficulty. To find out other interpretations of Ibn Sirin’s dreams, go to Google and type the Egyptian dream interpretation site... You will find everything you are looking for. The most important interpretations of a dream about driving a car for a married man. Interpretation of a dream about driving a car quickly for a married man. One dream can have more than one interpretation in reality, The dream of driving a car quickly has many interpretations, some good and others difficult. Which does not lead to accidents, for

title: It expresses Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing the king in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a king in a dream: Seeing a king is one of those visions that surprises some people. This vision has many connotations that vary according to many considerations, including that the person may know the image of the king, and the king may be alive or dead, and the king may give you something or take it away, and what concerns us about it. This article examines all the indicators and special cases of seeing the king in a dream. It expresses Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing the king in a dream. Seeing the king in a dream. Seeing the king in a dream represents authority, power, influence, enjoying great powers, and rising to a high position. This vision is an indication of the great transformations that are occurring in the world. The life of the dreamer, and positive changes that will reap results sooner or later. If one sees the king in a dream, this is an indication of assuming high positions, achieving fruitful successes, achieving planned goals, achieving goals and high status, opening doors in his face, and collecting many profits in the future. At the same time. And if the fortuneteller sees the king’s head and the crown on it, this indicates guardianship, increasing influence, career advancement, amazing improvement in the situation, and making the right decisions, the results of which are positive and beneficial in general. For Nabulus’ interpretation of this vision, he said that this vision expresses ambition for a better future and hard work from In order to expand projects, implement plans, and reach the extent they deserve. But if he sees that he is arguing with the ruler, this indicates discussion in matters of governance, truth, defending the verses of the Wise Qur’an, supporting the oppressed and standing by them. If the monarch sees the royal crown, it indicates abundance. Knowledge, acquiring knowledge, reaping the fruits of work, collecting money, and blessings for the child and offspring. Seeing the king in a dream by Ibn Sirin. In his interpretation of the king’s vision, Ibn Sirin says that this vision expresses the king and the position that a person quickly reaches or the support that he receives from some, which alleviates the difficulties of the path. And if the The dreamer has a problem or need, and sees the king, then it symbolizes relief from need, achieving the goal, freedom from sadness and sorrow, finding an appropriate solution to his problem, and improving circumstances a little. Ibn Sirin distinguishes between the appearance in which the king appears. If he is young, this symbolizes circumstances. The present era and the present of the person, but if the king resembles a child, then this indicates the future and the events that will occur in it. If the dreamer sees the king restraining a person and the person appears as if he is a foreigner, then this indicates the expansion of the king’s domain, the increase of his influence, and the restriction of fraudsters, traitors, and infidels in power. And whoever sees the king sleeps. In his bed, reassured, this is a sign of satisfying needs, paying debts, and achieving what is desired without entering into useless discussions. If a person sees that the king crucified him or ordered him to be tortured, this indicates the prestige and elevation that the king grants to the observer among the people, and what he gave him may be in violation of the orders of Sharia law. Seeing the king in a single woman’s dream. Seeing the king in her dream expresses vitality, activity, competence, the ability to undergo experiments with great enthusiasm, etc.

title: Interpretation of the dream of giving birth to a son for a pregnant woman and the interpretation of the dream of giving birth to twins, a boy and a girl, for a pregnant woman according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about giving birth to a pregnant woman When a woman knows that she is pregnant, some things may appear to her in the dream world, some of which have an interpretation, and others are interpretations of the subconscious mind and its perceptions. Interpretation of a dream about giving birth to a son for a pregnant woman by Ibn Sirinya. Who interprets the dream of giving birth to a boy for pregnant women? Giving birth to a boy in a dream for a pregnant woman expresses her desire for this matter, that is, she wants to give birth to a boy because she has females or wants this matter and calls upon the Creator, Glory be to Him. Some interpreters go to another topic about seeing a pregnant woman giving birth to a boy and say that it is a symbol of pregnancy for a girl, that is, the opposite happens to her in reality. If a woman sees that she is giving birth to a beautiful male child and feels great joy in the dream, this indicates the ease of birth conditions and her strong health and that she did not go through any crises before giving birth, God willing. On the other hand, some experts believe that giving birth to a sick boy or a boy with undesirable qualities indicates his poor health and she must take into account some health problems so that she does not lose her fetus or suffer from a serious crisis. In childbirth. Interpretation of a dream about giving birth to a boy for pregnant women Ibn Sirin The great dream scholar Ibn Sirin explains that seeing the birth of a child for a pregnant woman has more than one indication of the shape of that child. However, if the appearance of this child is undesirable and the mother is sad about his birth, the interpretation is related to his falling into many dilemmas in the following days with the difficulties of childbirth, God forbid. One of the signs of giving birth to a child in a pregnant woman's vision is that it is good news that she prays to God in this matter, because He can give her what she wants and be a righteous offspring that makes her heart the same. He makes her happy and reassures her in her old age. And about seeing a dead child after his birth, Ibn Sirin explains that it is not good because it symbolizes the loss of a family member and being exposed to a great disaster that burdens them and puts a lot of pressure on them. To interpret your dream accurately and quickly, Google the dream interpretation site in Egypt. Interpretation of a dream about giving birth to a boy for a pregnant woman If a married woman sees that she is giving birth to a boy in her dream, and she is happy and laughing loudly, it is likely that she will become pregnant soon, and this boy will be close in appearance and characteristics to the boy she is. I saw in her dream. As for if the woman is suffering from a difficult problem related to pregnancy and saw that she was giving birth to an ugly boy, this may mean that the circumstances she is going through are difficult and she is sad about them, because she hopes to get a good child who will make her happy in this world and the next. I dreamed that - that. My wife I gave birth to a boy who is not pregnant If a man sees in his dream that his wife gave birth to a boy and she is not actually pregnant, he will be a generous and merciful person to everyone, which means that he is well-behaved and does not have bad morals or behavior towards people. The opinions of the scholars of interpretation differed in this vision, some of them say that his wife may become pregnant soon, while another category explains that there is a desire in this man, which is to have a boy, and thus it is reversed. In the world of dreams and watches him. As for if this wife is actually pregnant and her husband sees that, this is a good omen that good things will come to him in his life
